subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Any Given Saturday continued on the road to the Breeders’ Cup Classic with a two-and-a-half-length victory yesterday in the $154,200 Brooklyn Handicap at Belmont Park. The colt will be one of the top contenders in the $5 million Classic on Oct. 27 at Monmouth Park.
